snippet.title: Inbento - alpha gameplay
snippet.description:
Inbento is a food-themed puzzle game where you arrange lunch boxes, playing as a parent raising small kittens. 

Features:
- unique pattern-matching mechanics,
- inspired by Japanese aesthetics and lunch boxes (bento),
- around 100 levels at launch (2+ hours of gameplay),
- welcoming difficulty curve with bonus stages for advanced players,
- light, textless narrative about parenthood.

http://afterburn.games
